subject: style(charts): match embed chart colors to see-veo theme
body:
Pass accent and muted URL params to repo-tor iframes so the
daily-distribution and hourly-distribution bar charts use our
primary (#38bdf8) and secondary (#818cf8) theme colors instead
of the dashboard defaults.

Tags: styling, embed, theme
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: theme-consistency
Semver: patch
